app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2218-273X/10/6/948/s1, Table S1. Chemical composition of essential oil obtained by hydrodistillation from E. ciliata dried herb using GC-MS analysis. Table S2. The effect of E. ciliata essential oil on the AP changes in the rabbit heart. Table S3. The efficacy of the E. ciliata action on OAP changes in the rabbit heart. Figure S1. Epi- and endo-cardial stimulations: Dependence of the conduction velocity on the E. ciliata concentrations, Figure S2. Atrial stimulation: Optical maps revealing E. ciliata effects on electrical activation process in the heart, Figure S3. Atrial stimulation: Changes in OAP duration maps induced by E. ciliata, Figure S4. Endocardial stimulation: Optical maps revealing E. ciliata effects on electrical activation process in the heart, Figure S5. Endocardial stimulation: Changes in OAP duration maps induced by E. ciliata.
